content: give me sql query on my last bill amount?

```sql
SELECT amount, due_date, status FROM billing_records WHERE customer_id = ? ORDER BY bill_date DESC LIMIT 1;
```

This SQL query will retrieve the last bill amount for the customer whose ID is provided.  Please replace `?` with your customer ID.  Let me know if you have any other billing questions.
show me my payment history for the last 3 months?

```sql
SELECT payment_date, amount FROM payment_history WHERE customer_id = ? AND payment_date >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH)
```

This SQL query will retrieve your payment history for the last 3 months. Please replace `?` with your customer ID.  Let me know if you have any other payment history questions.
